excerpt.rendered:
Distilled on the 16th October 2004 and bottled after 12 years matured solely in a single European Oak Sherry Butt #11650 One of only 298 bottles.

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 12
Vintage : 2004
ABV : 65.20%
